title: ビットコイン一時10万5千ドルまで下落、流動性不安再燃｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: *本レポートは、X-Bankクリプトアナリストである仮想NISHI（...

title: Web3大手アニモカ・ブランズ、ナスダック上場の計画　AIインフラのカレンクと合併で
contentSnippet: アニモカ・ブランズがAIインフラを手がけるカレンクと合併契約を締結。2026年にナスダック上場することを計画している。上場Web3・仮想通貨コングロマリットが誕生する見通しだ。

title: Balancerの不正流出受けて、L1「ベラチェーン」ネットワークを停止
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアム互換のL1ベラチェーンは、バランサーへの攻撃を受け、エコシステムへの影響を抑えるために対策を講じたと発表。場合によってはハードフォークを行うと述べている。

title: Solana's SOL Bleeds Nearly 20% Since ETF Debut Despite 'Very Solid' Inflows
contentSnippet: The weak action happened despite SOL exchange-traded products booking their second strongest weekly inflow on record driven by the new ETFs, CoinShares said.

title: Hollywood.com Reveals Crypto-Powered Prediction Market for Movies, TV and More
contentSnippet: Fresh off its Trump Media deal for Truth Predict, Crypto.com reveals plans for entertainment prediction markets via Hollywood.com.

title: A Smarter Way to Talk to AI: Here's How to ‘Context Engineer’ Your Prompts
contentSnippet: A team at Shanghai AI Lab says most AI errors stem not from bad models but from thin prompts. Their solution—“context engineering”—shows that giving language models richer background information leads

title: Ripple Acquires Crypto Wallet and Custody Firm Palisade
contentSnippet: Fintech firm Ripple made another acquisition, this time snatching up wallet provider and custody firm Palisade on Monday.

title: Ripple Acquires Crypto Wallet Firm Palisade to Expand Institutional Payments Business
contentSnippet: With the acquisition, Ripple aims to provide quickly-deployable wallets to boost fintech and corporate crypto payments, president Monica Long said in an interview.

title: AI Browsers Are Headed to Crypto—Donut Labs Just Raised $22 Million to Build It First
contentSnippet: Donut Labs says its AI-powered browser can analyze markets and execute trades on its own.

title: ArXiv Blocks AI-Generated Survey Papers After 'Flood' of Trashy Submissions
contentSnippet: Preprint repository ArXiv is cracking down on survey papers after AI tools make it easy to mass-produce low-quality submissions that overwhelm volunteer moderators.

title: Bitcoin Miners IREN, Cipher Rise After Multi-Billion-Dollar Microsoft, Amazon Deals
contentSnippet: The transactions are the latest between Magnificent Seven companies and Bitcoin miner and data center firms.

title: SUI Token Drops 9% as Institutional Selling Hits Harder Than Broader Crypto Market
contentSnippet: Volume jumped 628% as SUI sliced through key support, then bounced — without buyer conviction.

title: US Bitcoin ETFs Lost $946 Million After Hawkish Tone From Fed
contentSnippet: Solana funds surged with $421 million in fresh capital. Overall, crypto ETFs shed $360 million in assets.

title: Balancer Exploited for $128 Million Across Ethereum Chains as Berachain Halts Network
contentSnippet: Some $128 million in crypto was stolen from Balancer liquidity pools on Ethereum and beyond, with Berachain halting its chain as a result.

title: Nasdaq Reprimands TON Treasury for $558 Million Stock Sale, Crypto Buy
contentSnippet: Nasdaq said TON Strategy failed to get shareholder approval for a massive crypto-fueled fundraise—but stopped short of delisting the company’s stock.

title: Chainlink Drops 10% Amid Crypto Selloff; New Rewards Program Unveiled
contentSnippet: The oracle network's token hit its weakest price since the October 10 crash, breaking key support levels after multiple failed breakout last week.

title: Morning Minute: Tether Prints $10 Billion in Profit
contentSnippet: Stablecoin giant Tether has tripled its USDT supply since 2023, and generating profits that would make major banks jealous.

title: Stellar Holds the Line at $0.277 as Buyers Defend Key Support Zone
contentSnippet: XLM steadies after a sharp 5.5% sell-off, with traders watching the $0.277 level as the critical line between recovery and renewed downside pressure.

title: ICP Slides 5.5% as Bulls Lose Momentum After Volatile Session
contentSnippet: The token climbed to nearly $4.30 late on Sunday, before tracking downward throughout Monday.

title: Hedera’s HBAR Slides 5% as $0.19 Support Crumbles, Traders Eye Technical Reversal
contentSnippet: Hedera token breaks key technical level amid volume surge, though late-session reversal signals emerge.

title: BONK Tumbles as Meme Token Breaks Support, Tests Key Lows
contentSnippet: BONK slid to $0.00001232, breaking through critical support as sales pressure swept through Solana-linked meme tokens.

title: Polkadot Slumps as Bears Break Key Support at $2.87
contentSnippet: Heavy institutional selling pressure triggered a technical breakdown in DOT.

title: Bitcoin Slides Below $106K as Cryptos Tumble, Nearing October Crash Lows
contentSnippet: The downturn in prices rippled across derivatives markets, liquidating over $1 billion in leveraged trading positions across all digital assets Monday, CoinGlass data showed.

title: 欧州が仮想通貨・証券の統一監督機関設立を検討　米SECモデルに
contentSnippet: 欧州委員会が仮想通貨・証券取引所を一元監督する機関を構想している。米証券取引委員会をモデルにしており、ESMAの権限拡大案も検討していると伝えられる。

title: FTX債権者は仮想通貨上昇分の恩恵受けられずか　債権実質回収率の試算は9%～46%
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所FTXの債権者は破綻時の現金相当額で弁済されるため、債権者はビットコインなどの上昇分を受け取れないことになる。債権者代表は、実質回収率は9～46%と推算した。

title: 仮想通貨Zcash、プライバシー取引機能をさらに強化へ　新ロードマップ公開
contentSnippet: 匿名機能を重視する仮想通貨Zcashが2025年10～12月期のロードマップを発表した。プライバシー機能を大幅強化し、スワップ毎の使い捨てアドレスなどを導入する計画だ。

title: Sui DEX「Momentum」、11月上旬にTGE予定　累積取引量250億ドル超でエコシステム基盤化
contentSnippet: Sui最大のDEX「Momentum」、210万人のユーザーを獲得。投票型ガバナンスで投票者自身が報酬配分を決定し、プールの手数料を得る仕組みで流動性の安定化を目指す。

title: JPYCの買い方・使い方まとめ｜何ができる？今後の活用法・注意点を徹底解説
contentSnippet: JPYCが資金移動業ライセンスを取得し、日本初の円建てステーブルコイン「JPYC EX」を発行へ。特徴や将来性を徹底解説。

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、フランスのビットコイン戦略的備蓄法案提出やソラナETFの米上場など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: メタマスクの使い方、仮想通貨の送金や交換：スワップ、便利機能を図解でわかりやすく
contentSnippet: MetaMaskのインストール方法から送金手順、暗号資産（仮想通貨）取引所への送金や取引所からの出庫方法、セキュリティ対策までを初心者向けに詳しく解説。自己管理型ウォレットの基本知識を身に付けましょう。
